This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 209,947,534 reported in the network role http://www.luka-kp.si/xbrl/role/Izkazfinancnegapolozaja should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 191,182,419 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.luka-kp.si/xbrl/role/Izkazlastniskegakapitala. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
